addRevenue(uint256).details: Can only be called by authorized rental managers      Uses Accumulated Rewards algorithm: accRevenuePerToken += (amount * PRECISION) / totalSupply

params.amount: Revenue amount to add (USDC, 95% of rental payment after protocol fee)

afterBalanceChange(address,uint256).details: Called by DatasetToken's _update function to update reward debt      Ensures user can only claim future rewards based on new balance

params.newBalance: User's new balance after the change

beforeBalanceChange(address,uint256).details: Called by DatasetToken's _update function to save pending dividends      Prevents dividend loss during transfers

claimDividends().details: User pays gas for claiming. Combines pendingClaim with newly accumulated rewards.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

accRevenuePerToken().notice: Accumulated revenue per token (scaled by PRECISION)

addRevenue(uint256).notice: Adds revenue to the pool and updates accumulated rewards

afterBalanceChange(address,uint256).notice: Hook called after token balance changes

authorizedManagers(address).notice: Authorized rental managers that can add revenue

beforeBalanceChange(address,uint256).notice: Hook called before token balance changes

claimDividends().notice: Claims all pending dividends for the caller

getPendingDividends(address).notice: Gets user's pending dividends (ready to claim)

getTotalRevenue().notice: Gets total revenue in the pool

getUserTotalClaimed(address).notice: Gets total amount claimed by a user

setAuthorizedManager(address,bool).notice: Authorizes or deauthorizes a rental manager

totalClaimed().notice: Total dividends claimed by all users

totalRevenue().notice: Total revenue added to the pool

userTotalClaimed(address).notice: Mapping of total claimed per user
